about.details:
Incorporated in 2015, Bengaluru based Xelpmoc Design and Tech Limited is a company engaged in the business of providing technical consulting services and end-to-end technology solutions and support.

The company caters entrepreneurs, start-ups and established companies in public and private sector. It provides a wide range of services, including, mobile and web application development, prototype development, thematic product development, data science and analytics assistance.

As of June 30, 2018, the company has served over 23 clients in India. The company intends to leverage its existing business model to enter newer geographies such as the Middle East and North Africa (MENA), United States, United Kingdom, Asia Pacific and Australia.

faqs.question: What is the Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO?
faqs.answer:
Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO is a main-board IPO of equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹23.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹66 per share. The minimum order quantity is 200.

The IPO opens on January 23, 2019, and closes on January 25, 2019.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO opens on January 23, 2019 and closes on January 25, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO?
faqs.answer: Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO lot size is 200, and the minimum amount required is ₹13,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO will be done on Wednesday, January 30, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, February 1, 2019. Check the Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Xelpmoc Design and Tech IPO listing date is on Monday, February 4, 2019.

promoterHolding.promoters: The Individual Promoters of the company are Sandipan Chattopadhyay Srinivas Koora; and Jaison Jose. The Individual Promoters hold in aggregate 7456990 Equity Shares representing 73.08% of the pre-issue paid up Equity Share Capital of the Company.
